    Pollen Action

    • üìÖ Date: 2017 November 1
    • üïë Duration:
    • üé´ Event: FRC Betabots 2017
    • ùì£  Theme:

    Strategy game where 2 players alternate turn‚Äôs to send pollen or propolis in flowers. You control a flower if a propolis is on the bottom or you have the last pollen in the flower.

    First game I made where the rules are already set. It was mostly execution, because it‚Äôs a physical game that is played with robots. My goal was to be able to practice the pure strategy of the whole game.

    Medias

    2 Players playing.

    Ai games, made quick to see what pattern emerges.
